alert.note: Alert for Marion (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:23AM CDT until August 12 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PIKE...SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS AND EASTERN MARION COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hannibal, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Hannibal, Palmyra, Quincy Regional Airport, Payson, Fall Creek, Adams, Burton, Hull, Taylor, Marblehead, and Seehorn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 between exits 2 and 14. Interstate 72 near exit 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
